tagline: Eat like a Jedi. Dine like a hero.
description:
SaberStix Light-Up Chopsticks bring a galactic twist to every meal. Crafted for movie fans and food lovers alike, these LED-powered utensils glow with the iconic energy-blade aesthetic while staying completely food-safe and reusable. Perfect for sushi nights, themed parties, cosplay-worthy dinners, or as a standout collectible gift, SaberStix turn ordinary dining into an interstellar experience.

Each pair features a bright LED glow with an easy on/off switch, four vibrant energy colors to match your mood or menu, and BPA-free acrylic construction for safe, long-lasting use. Detachable handles make cleaning a breeze and ensure quick, hassle-free washing. Batteries are included so you can ignite your dinner right out of the box. Whether youâ€™re building a sci-fi kitchen display or simply want to add a little fun to mealtime, SaberStix delivers memorable moments with every bite.
keyFeatures: Bright LED glow with convenient on/off switch
Available in four energy colors: Blue, Red, Green, Purple
Detachable handles for easy cleaning and dishwasher-friendly maintenance

specifications.Dimensions: Approximately 8.5 inches (21.5 cm) long; 0.3 inches (0.8 cm) diameter
specifications.Material: BPA-free acrylic with integrated LED components

benefits: Adds a unique, galaxy-inspired flair to meals and gatherings
Reusable and easy to clean with detachable handles
Perfect for gifts, parties, and collectors of themed merchandise
targetAudience: Sci-fi and fantasy fans, teenagers and adults who love novelty gadgets, collectors of themed merchandise, and gift buyers seeking a playful, standout kitchen accessory
